parameter.name: title
parameter.description: Title of the task. Maximum length is 255 characters.

parameter.name: assigneeId
parameter.description: ID of the person to whom the task is assigned.

parameter.name: completed
parameter.description: Indicate whether the task is completed or not.

parameter.name: recurrenceType
parameter.description: Type of recurrence: day, week, month, year. .

parameter.name: dueDate
parameter.description: Due date of the task. Formatted as an ISO8601 date.

parameter.name: starred
parameter.description: Indicate whether the task is starred or not.

parameter.name: taskId
parameter.description: ID of the task whose details would be retrieved.

parameter.name: revision
parameter.description: Revision of the task to update.

parameter.name: remove
parameter.description: List of attributes to be removed from the task.
